org.spf4j.io

Class Csv

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.io.Csv

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Csv
extends Object
    Supports CSV format as described at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values. either of \n \r or \r\n are valid end of line delimiters why another implementation? because I need one that is as fast as possible, and as flexible as possible.
    Author:
    zoly

      • asIterable

        public static Iterable<Iterable<String>> asIterable(Reader preader)
        read a CSV stream, as a Iterable over rows. the List instance is reused during iteration, you will need to copy content into own data structure.
        Parameters:
        preader -
        Returns:

public static int readCsvElement(Reader reader,
                                                   StringBuilder addElemTo)
                                            throws IOException
        returns next character.
        Parameters:
